title: 79/286/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 February 1979 on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus described as 'Orion - Ionised Calcium Analyser, model SS-20'
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 28 February 1979  on the refusal to accept the scientific character of an apparatus described as "Orion-Ionised Calcium Analyser, model SS-20"  (79/286/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Orion-Ionised Calcium Analyser, model SS-20" is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 1979.
